Description: 
This application implements two commands to demonstrate the creation and removal of GROUP.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use LayerSample.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the LayerSample.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "GroupTest" command, which  makes a (anonymous) group by the parameters specified.
4. Execute the "UnGroupTest" command, which breaks up the group that you specify.
